reviewText: Pride and prejudice is my all time favorite movie- great price for these amazing movies.
Buy each individually. Great movies, but they run between $7-13 apiece on amazon. Why would you pay nearly $75 when you can get all four, in blue ray format, for $35?
LADIES OF LITERATURE BUNDLE(PRIDE & PREJUDICE/ATONEMENT/JANE EYRE/  SO MANY MOVIES WITH KIERA KNIGHTLEY I JUST LOVE IT
I'm a big fan of British drama. I'm very happy to own pride and prejudice along with sense and sensibility!!! Great acting and story line.
Excellent films at a great price, this bundle made the perfect gift.  Separately I have seen these films and really enjoyed them, and this price point was an extra incentive to buy them together.
Love "Jane Eyre" but not this version!!!  And the remaining three movies are average.
haven't had time to watch all of them yet. But know the stories well, so expect to enjoy them.
